import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import apiService, { api } from '../../utils/api'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); const [games, setGames] = useState([]); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); // Fetch admin data useEffect(() => { const fetchAdminData = async () => { try { setIsLoading(true); // Get system statistics const statsResponse = await api.get('/api/admin/stats'); setStats(statsResponse.data); // Get all games - using direct API call to avoid undefined method error const gamesResponse = await api.get('/api/games'); setGames(gamesResponse.data); // Get all users const usersResponse = await api.get('/api/admin/users'); setUsers(usersResponse.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching admin data:', error); toast.error('Der opstod en fejl ved hentning af data'); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; fetchAdminData(); }, []); // Navigate to all games const handleSeeAllGames = () => { navigate('/admin/all-games'); }; // Navigate to manage game const handleManageGame = (gameId) => { navigate(`/manage-game/${gameId}`); }; // Navigate to game statistics const handleGameStatistics = (gameId) => { navigate(`/admin/statistics/${gameId}`); }; if (isLoading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Dashboard header */}

{/* Stats overview */} {stats && (

Brugere

{stats.userCount}

0 ? (stats.activeGameCount / stats.gameCount) * 100 : 0}%` }} >

Hold pr. spil {(stats.teamCount / (stats.gameCount || 1)).toFixed(1)}

Besvarelser

{stats.submissionCount}

Afventer bed√∏mmelse {stats.pendingSubmissionCount}
0 ? (stats.pendingSubmissionCount / stats.submissionCount) * 100 : 0}%` }} >
)} {/* Recent games */}

Seneste spil

{games.length > 0 ? (
{games.slice(0, 5).map((game) => ( ))}
Spiltitel Oprettet af Status Hold Oprettet Handling
{game.title}
{game.accessCode}
{game.createdBy?.username}
 {game.isActive ? 'Aktiv' : 'Inaktiv'}
{game.teamCount}
{new Date(game.createdAt).toLocaleDateString('da-DK')}
{/* Add Manage button */} {/* Statistics button */}
) : (

Ingen spil fundet.

)}
{/* Recent users */}

Se alle

{new Date(user.createdAt).toLocaleDateString('da-DK')}

) : (

Ingen brugere fundet.

)}
{/* Quick actions */}

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
